metadata.title: Is there any difference between RH850G3K and RH850G3KH core?

sections.content:
Question:
Is there any difference between RH850G3K and RH850G3KH core?
Answer:
G3K Core – e.g. RH850/F1L (elder series)
max. 96MHz, 5 Stage pipeline, no FPU, MPU (4 areas), no PE Guard
G3KH core – e.g. RH850/F1K (newer series)
max. 240MHz, 5 Stage pipeline, FPU, MPU (16 areas), PE Guard
  Suitable Products
RH850/F1x
